location.address: LR Arcade,4121, Old Airport Road, Bangalore

event.description:
Get Bowled over this IPL Season!! 
ONLY AT BIG PITCHER!!
	Big Screening – All days at Club Kahuna, Splitwood & Star Lounge 
	Happy Hours – Sunday to Thursday from 11:00 AM to 07:PM at Club Kahuna 
	Monday Blues – All day Happy hours on All MONDAYS from 11:00 AM to 1:00 AM
	Combo Offers – Club Kahuna 
	Free Class of Beer – At Splitwood from 11:00 AM to 5:00 PM
	Live Action with DJs – At Club Kahuna & Studio 4121 
Call 080-4553-0000 for your reservation!! Don’t Miss out on the Action!!
event.title: Get Bowled over this IPL Season!!
